uk.ac.gla.dcs.tp3.w.league

Class Match

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.gla.dcs.tp3.w.league.Match

  • public class Match
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has many members. The class holds the information, and result of, a match between two teams. This is an element of the fixture list which is used by both the UI and algorithm.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team W

      • Match

        public Match()

      • Match

        public Match(Team h,
     Team a,
     int hs,
     int as,
     java.util.Date d,
     boolean b)
        A typical constructor to create a match object.
        Parameters:
        h - The home team
        a - The away team
        hs - The home team's score
        as - The away team's score
        d - The date the match is played
        b - A boolean to show if the match has been played or not.

      • getWinner

        public Team getWinner()
        Works out which team won the match and returns a reference to the winning team. If the game has not been played yet, null is returned.
        Returns:
        A reference to the team with the higher score.

      • updatePointsAndPlayGame

        public void updatePointsAndPlayGame()
        If the match has just been played, find out which team won. Add a point for the winning team and increment the total number of games played by both teams then remove the reference to the upcoming match arrays.
